activation.reactionTrigger: An ally makes a saving throw against an area effect.

system.description: When an ally within range of your Commanding Presence would make a saving throw against an area effect, you can use your reaction to shout at them and your ally can use their reaction to move up to half their Speed. If your ally ends their movement outside the area, the area effect has no effect on them. Once you use this feature, you cannot do so again until you finish a long rest.
